---
title: "Beatpad Chaos"
---

This page demonstrates use of a beat pad (grid of buttons) to demonstrate the game of life, cellular automata,
chaotic attractors, and the Ising/Potts models. 

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
P5 = require("p5")

function* createSketch(sketch) {
  const element = DOM.element('div');
  yield element;
  const instance = new P5(sketch, element, true);
  try {
    while (true) {
      yield element;
    }
  } finally {
    instance.remove();
  }
}
```

## Donut test
```{ojs}
//| code-fold: true
createSketch(s => {

  s.setup = function() {
    s.createCanvas(746, 746, s.WEBGL);
    s.noStroke();
  }

  s.draw = function() {

    s.background(0);

    let locX = s.mouseX - s.height / 2;
    let locY = s.mouseY - s.width / 2;  
    
    s.ambientLight(60, 60, 60);
    s.pointLight(190, 80, 190, locX, locY, 100);
    s.pointLight(80, 80, 190, 0, 0, 100);
  
    s.specularMaterial(255);
    s.rotateX(s.frameCount * 0.01);
    s.rotateY(s.frameCount * 0.01);
    s.torus(150, 80, 64, 64);
  }

})
```
